name: Wonky Vehicular Manslaughter
description:
BEST played with a haptic feedback compatible gamepad. 

Drive around and kill all the weird dudes. 

Made for Jame Gam 11. 

KEYBOARD/MOUSE CONTROLS: 

SHOOT - Right and Left Mouse buttons

Throttle and Reverse - W/S

Steer - A/D

Reset Position - R

GAMEPAD CONTROLS: 

SHOOT - Right and Left Shoulder/Bumber

Throttle and Reverse - Right and Left Triggers

Steer - Left Joystick

Reset Position - Y / Triangle Button
